body:
so I have been working on a pvp montage for a long time now (3-4 hours XD) and would appreciate if you could come and check it out! 

Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fh0iDqNh4Vg&feature=youtu.be

Please like and subscribe if you liked the video <3
Comments are always helpful for feedback :D

replies.body: Nice work on the montage, I liked the music choice as well. The quality of the recording could have been improved, and it would have been nice to see all the map showcases with renders. Maybe something to keep in mind if you do a montage again!
